name: 灵魂筹码 - 凶尸蒸汽动力套装 Soul at Stake - Steam Power The Corpse's Outfit
detailed_description:
STEAM POWER

The Corpse's "Steam Power" costume DLC includes a Cicada Coin outfit: Steam Power.

Lives are destined to rot, whereas machines run forever. Let the massacre begin in the ultimate power of steam and hatred.



You can also redeem this outfit using Cicada Coins at TREASURE interface in Soul at Stake. Considering the actual value of the Cicada Coins in the game, it should be a reasonable price for this DLC. Cicada Coins are earned by referring friends and let them input your referral code before any of their characters reaches level 5. For those who already owned this outfit, you don't need to purchase the DLC again.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7, Windows 8.1)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 Compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Low quality settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 960 or AMD R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 Compatible

subs.option_text: Soul at Stake - Steam Power The Corpse's Outfit - 33,99€

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains a chase and slash game mode that uses sharp or blunt weapons, the screen will have a blood splash effect on a successful attack and during the execution event. The setting option "Bloody Mode" is available in the game. Turning off the "Bloody Mode" can change the blood color to green and has a mosaic occlusion when executed.
